title: 231-Irish Folklore: Challenge Accepted
itunes:title: 231-Irish Folklore: Challenge Accepted
description:
Two stories from Ireland. On the first, Finn McCool, a giant Irish here, isn't scared! He totally isn't! He's just speed walking away from that guy he's been threatening for weeks who finally showed up at his shore after leaving an incorrect forwarding address.

The second is the story of a Leprechaun, and why you never want to take your eyes off the little guy.

The creatures are the wish hounds! They're surprisingly dark for creatures called "wish hounds."

--

itunes:summary: Two stories from Ireland: a giant in a onesie and a leprechaun getting tricked for once.
itunes:author: Jason Weiser, Carissa Weiser
